SourceString:
Welcome back!
Provided by the World Inn Association
Travel Concierge Service Counter is here.
<bw_break>
So, which service are you using today?\n<bw_break>
Is there anything else you need?\n<yesno><break>
Thank you for using our service.\nI hope you have a fulfilling and adventurous life.\n<end>

Hey….
You are a customer who has not yet registered.
Would you like to explain about our service?
<yesno><break>

This is a travel concierge. We are dispatched by the World Inn Association to provide various services to adventurers.
We We would like to introduce you to the services provided by .
With the reward storage service, you can temporarily receive reward items that you were unable to receive when completing a quest. We will take care of it for you.
We also have recommended quests and travel destination information.
Would you like to register now to use the concierge\nservice?\n<yesno><break>
Okay.\nPlease wait a moment….\n<wait=1000><break>

Thank you for waiting! {pc} has been registered as a service member!
When using the service, please visit the inns in various locations. lf> Standing wearing this outfit Please talk to the travel concierge.
Thank you for registering. Your fulfilling adventure life I hope I can help you.
I see...\nYou can register at any time, so\nplease come back if you change your mind.
Here is the quest that I can guide you, {pc},\nto now.\n<bw_break>

What do you think? If you don't like it, we will
guide you to another quest, so please select the
quest guide again.
<bw_break>

I'm sorry, but there are no quests that I can
offer to {pc} right now.
Please inquire at another time.
<bw_break>

What would you like to explain?
<select_se_off>
About discounts
View information
About receiving rewards
<select_end><break>

If you happen to get an inflatable ticket during your trip, please bring it here. You can inflate once per ticket.
'' Of course, whether you win or not depends on your luck. It's fair for both new and veteran adventurers. I hope you win some good fortune.

The quest guide will guide you to the quests that you can take.
If you are not sure what to do, please use it.< lf>

You can receive quest and story rewards that you could not earlier by receiving rewards.
Please take advantage of this reward receiving service {pc} Please use it for your adventure.
Would you like to receive experience points or rewards?

Which one would you like to receive?
<select_se_off>
What to use
Soubi Bag
<select_end><break>

There are no rewards that can be given to {pc} right now.
Any quest rewards or story rewards that you could not receive will be kept at at the concierge. I'll keep it.
'Which item would you like to receive?

I'm sorry, but it looks like {BagName} is full of
and can't hold it.
Please sort it out and try again later.
<bw_break>
I'm sorry, but it looks like you can't hold {ItemName} anymore.\nPlease sort it out and try again later.\n<bw_break>
That's all the compensation I have for you.\nThank you for using our service.
We have received your experience points.\nThank you very much.
... Currently, it seems that {pc} is not depositing\nexperience points. By doing so, you will receive\nstory experience points.

...Currently, {pc}'s level doesn't seem to be going up any further.
We recommend that you receive after changing to another job. I will do it.

...Currently, {pc} has given me this much experience.
I am happy to receive experience points from my current job. Is it?
I see you're quitting.\nI'm sorry.
Since {pc}'s current occupation level has reached the\nupper limit,\nwe are also asking for the experience points of {EXP_Concierge}.
It's 'Experience Point Storage Settings.' This is a service that temporarily stores\nthe experience points obtained from\nstories and quests.

Currently, experience points for stories and quests are set to
{EXP_Concierge_Type}”.
Which setting would you like to change to?
<select_se_off>
Deposit received when clearing

<select_end><break>
Good luck. Experience points for stories and quests have been set to receive upon clearing.''
I'm smart. I have set the experience points from stories and quests to deposit''.
From now on, when you clear a story or quest,\nwe will keep your experience points here, so please come by when you want to receive them.
From now on, you will be able to receive\nexperience points on the spot when you clear a story or quest.
Please accept.

You can draw once with one ticket.
10 consecutive lottery tickets require 10 consecutive lottery tickets.
<select {index}>
Play a lottery
10 consecutive lottery tickets.
View prize details
<select_end>
<break>
Then I will give you {count} gift tickets.\nI pray that you will be blessed with great fortune.
Would you like to continue the massage?

Congratulations! You won\n{Lotory_Grade}!
Congratulations!\nYou won {Lotory_Item_Name} in {Lotory_Grade}.
It's {Lotory_Grade}, so you won\n{Lotory_Item_Num} {Lotory_Item_Name} !
This time I won these prizes.
The result of the calculation has changed and the grade that won\nhas changed to a better grade!
Please accept.
Please select the prize you would like to see in detail.
Hey... Mr. {pc}.\nThere's not enough space in your bag, so\nEven if you win the prize, you won't be able to keep it.
Hey... Mr. {pc}.\nIt looks like there are\nitems that you won't be able to keep even if you win the prize.
Please organize your bag and\nfree up some space before coming back.
We're sorry, but it looks like you don't have a\ncoupon.
We're sorry, but\nit looks like we don't have enough vouchers.
{pc} has\nacquired {itemname}.

Currently, {pc}, the destination I would recommend is... The mountain city of Gatara.
The mountain city of Gatara is located almost in the center of the Dwachakka continent.< lf> It is located in the core city of the dwarves. There is a rare castle called Garakuta Castle.
Also, ancient relics are often found around the town. Full of romance. It's a local thing. Perhaps there might be something useful for your adventures.

Dear {pc}, The recommended travel destination is... The Windy City of Azlan.
The Windy City, Azran, is located on the continent of Eltna. > It is the core city of the elves, located almost in the center. It is a pleasant town with a refreshing breeze.
There is also a sacred and fubetsu town called Kamshika... There are special animals all over the town, and they are cherished by the residents.

Dear {pc}, The recommended travel destination is... The town of Julet.
The town of Julet is an island in the center of the Wena Archipelago. It is the core city of Weddi on Jure Island. It is a very beautiful seaside town.
The scenery is truly reminiscent of a tropical resort. However, recently the town mayor... It is said that there are many incidents that trouble Mr. Boren.

Currently, {pc}, the destination I would recommend is... Glen Castle Town.
Gren Castle Town is located in the center of the Orgreed continent. It is the core city of Ogre, where it is located. It is a lively town that surrounds the sturdy Glen Castle.
Gren Castle seems to have been attracting a lot of adventurers recently. If you are interested, why not go and see it?

Currently, {pc}, the destination I would recommend is... The town of Orphea.
The town of Orfea is located on the continent of Pukland. It is a cheerful town of Pukuripo located in the center. There are many tourist attractions such as the Big Horn, but...
Most importantly, it is led by Captain Navret Nab Nabu University It is famous for its circus troupe. It seems that there will be special performances scheduled soon.

Dear {pc}... It seems that you have received five key emblems. Why don't you take a little slow and enjoy the train journey around here? You might have an unexpected encounter.
... and the World Inn. It was in the fortune-telling corner of this month's association newsletter. It's pretty accurate, so please take a look.

There are currently no travel destinations that we can recommend to {pc}.
Rather than that, wandering by train Didn't you receive some guidance from the wise man?
I think it would be a good idea for you to follow the guidance of the wise man for a while and travel .
...It was in the fortune-telling section of this month's newsletter of the World Inn Association. It's pretty accurate, so please take a look.

Oh? Mr. {pc}... You have no heart. You look like you have accomplished something big.
I would like to report on the results. Isn't there someone who should be here?
It seems that person is at the house of an ancient wizard in Glen Castle Town.
...It was in the fortune-telling corner of this month's newsletter of the World Inn Association. It's pretty accurate, so please take a look.

Currently, {pc}, the destination I would recommend is... Gartlant Castle.
Gartland Castle and the Gartland castle town that stretches out before your eyes. is the largest ogre nation located in the southern part of the continent of Orgreed. There is an incident where people disappear.
This is a very disturbing story, but... King Grosner, who rules Gartland, is an adventurer trying to solve the incident. It seems that they are recruiting.

Currently, {pc}, the destination I would recommend is... Megistris Castle.
Megistris Castle and the Megistris castle below. The capital is the largest nation of Pukuripo, located in the western part of the continent of Pukland.
Megistris Castle is also a castle town. The capital of Megistris is also a very fancy and exciting landscape.
However, lately, King Poupoppan seems to be worried about the demonic miasma that covers the continent. That's right.

Dear {pc}, My recommended travel destination is... Velinard Castle.
Velinard Castle and the castle town of Velinard are located in the Wena Islands. Located in the northwest, it is a very beautiful Wedi's largest nation.
Queen Diore, who rules Velinard, brings peace to the entire Wena Islands with songs of grace. It plays an important role.
Recently, however, it seems that the Queen's only son, Prince Odis, has been rebelling against the queen for some reason... Rebellion. Is it the period?

Dear {pc}, The recommended travel destination is... Kamiharmy Castle.
Kamiharmy Castle and its castle town, the royal capital. Kamihalmy is the largest elf nation located in the southwestern part of the continent of Eltna. It's even in Astortia, they compete for 1st and 2nd place.
However, King Nikoloi has been worried about something lately... He often visits the castle. lf> If he slips away, he worries his vassals.

Currently, {pc}, the destination I would recommend is... The Kingdom of Dolworm.
Located in the middle of the Gobble Desert, it is the largest nation of dwarves.
The royal palace, Dolwurm Crystal Palace, as its name suggests is a very beautiful building and is the residence of the royal family. In addition there is the Royal Research Institute, which conducts various research. I wonder if this is a research presentation.

Dear {pc}! Did you get 10 key emblems?! To our customers, It's my first time meeting you!
There are no more destinations that we can guide you to! Wonderful! Amazing! Wonderful! !
Haha... I’m sorry. I was so excited that I started reading. Oh well. However, that’s true...
Is there someone you should tell that you have obtained 10 key emblems?
I would be happy if you could go and tell that person as well. I think it will be possible.

Dear {pc}! By any chance, did you get 10 key emblems? To our customers, It's my first time meeting you!
There are no more destinations that we can guide you to! Wonderful! Amazing! Wonderful! !

Dear {pc}, My recommended travel destination is... Boarding the Grand Titus. We have received news that the sea route to the continent has been restored.
However, in order to board the Grand Titus, we have asked you to complete the quest. You need to solve it.
The quest name is Titus' Compass.'' You can get it by solving this Embarkation pass exchange Please bring your ticket with you...
We are at the Ship Management Bureau south of the port town of Lendor. Please visit Director Sugim. You will be able to travel to Lendarsia. .

The Grand Titus is currently sailing towards the Kingdom of Gran Zedora.
You can spend freely on board the ship until it reaches the continent of Rendersia. Please. You can also take a tour of the wheelhouse.

Dear {pc}, The recommended travel destination is... The Sanmon Checkpoint.
The Sanmon Checkpoint is, as the name suggests It is a checkpoint consisting of three gates.
In order to protect the Kingdom of Gran Zedora, which is located on the north side of the checkpoint, from invasions from other countries and monster armies. A very old time. It seems that it was built in
The only way to go from the beach of Cocolata to the Kingdom of Gran Zedora is to pass through this barrier.

Currently, {pc}, the destination I would recommend is... Melsandyi Village.
Located in the northwestern part of the Rendersia continent. Mersandi village is a very peaceful village surrounded by rich nature.
The Mersandi granary that spreads out to the south of the village is a special product of Mersan wheat. The fields are spreading out, and you can see the beautiful scenery of golden wheat fields.
However, recently, mysterious monsters have started to appear in the village... The villagers seem to be spending their days in anxiety.

Currently, {pc}, the destination I would recommend is... The town of Celed.
The town of Seredo is located in the southern part of the Rendersia continent. It is a town located in a mountainous region. It is also famous for having a Dharma temple nearby.
Since ancient times, travelers and ascetics have crossed steep mountain passes to visit the Dharma temple. There are many adventurers who come here to visit.
However, it seems that something strange is happening in the current town of Seredo. The cause is unknown. But... I'm curious.

Currently, {pc}, the destination I would recommend is... The Kingdom of Arahagiro.
The Kingdom of Arahagiro is located in the eastern part of the Rendersia continent. It is a country surrounded by desert.
Although it is a harsh desert environment, it is a kingdom that boasts great power, second only to the Kingdom of Gran Zedora in Rendersia. .
The region is also famous as a tourist attraction, with unique buildings and ruins such as monster fighting arenas, pyramids, and the Gyra jungle.

Currently, {pc}, the destination I would recommend is... The Kingdom of Gran Zedora.
Located in the north of Lendersia, its history spans over 3,000 years. Its rulers, famously, come from a long line of heros.
Separated from the continent's other regions by Three Way Gate and its coastline being mostly cliffs; its defenses are strong. Presently, the Hero Princess Anlucia rules the country.
Also, having the continent's grandest castle and townscapes make it worth seeing.
